post.author: 이진경
post.content:
Senior Data Analyst - Insurance :.

Status:  Full Time, Employee  Salary:  CAD 60,000.00 to CAD 100,000.00 per year
Plus Bonus and Profit Sharing  Reference Code:  M191801  

Job Location: Toronto  

Our client is a leading Canadian based financial services group operating in 15 countries worldwide. They are currently seeking a Senior Data Analyst that will be responsible for the following:

RESPONSIBILITIES:

1. Data Architecture Development / Delivery:

- Expertise in 3 schema data architecture principles conceptual, logical and physical database design
- Design 3 levels of data models enterprise, departmental and project for operational and data warehouse systems
- Reverse engineer existing databases to develop as is models integrating them into future models
- Develop business and technical metadata about entities, tables, business concepts and data models
- Maintain/enhance data dictionary and data models via a modeling tool
- Promote data modeling and overall data architecture process
- Develop subject matter expertise about critical data subject areas

2. Data-Centric System Architecture and Design:

- Influence I.S data strategy and sets data-centric design direction on assigned projects
- Translate business requirements into data/database oriented solutions
- Designs and develops data access, movement, conversion, cleansing, storage, and archival solutions

3. Application of Data Analysis to Deliver Business Objectives:

- Performs data analysis to determine where and how data is stored, what business rules are built into it and how data can be reused for various business needs
- Analyzes project requirements and performs data analysis in order to develop data/database solutions
- Expresses results of data analysis through flowcharts, process description, data matrices etc...
- Writes SQL code and supports DBA's, developers, and QA in understanding data model and the creation of test data

Skills requirements:

- Strong background in relational technology fundamentals, modeling and design
- Several years of I.T industry experience with a background in application development, systems analysis and

architecture
- Familiar with data modeling methodologies, tools and techniques
- Possesses data/database solution design skills
- Demonstrated experience using modeling, analysis, data access and SQL tools
- Experience using tools like Erwin, DBArtisan, Data Dictionary and Crystal reports
- Knowledge of DB2, XML, MQ Series, ETL tools-
- Familiar with COBOL, CICS, ISPF
- Effectively delegates and provides direction to DBA's, analysts and programmers
- Service oriented with focus on data reliability, enhancement, service level delivery and quality of deliverables
- Excellent oral/written communication skills including presentation, documentation, negotiation and user interviewing
- Team player capable of operating in both functional and matrix organization balancing the goals/priorities of each structure
- Work effectively with high level direction, strategies, visions and problem statements

SALARY RANGE: $60,000 to $100,000 plus bonus and profit sharing

EDUCATION: University Degree or equivalent experience


Contact Information :.
Steven Watts
swatts@stoakley.com
Stoakley-Dudley Consultants Ltd.
6547A Mississauga Rd.
Mississauga Ontario L5N 1A6
Ph: 905-821-3455
post.title: Senior Data Analyst - Insurance :.
